name: Slime Size!
description:
Slime Size is a little project made in a one week jam by Daigfe (art) and Oscar Abad (programming).

The game has 7 puzzle levels in witch you would control a little slime who can change sizes. With this ability, they can move heavy boxes, pass thru small pipes, or endure the powerful winds from the fans.

CONTROLS:

Move: W(up)   A (left)   S (down)   D(right)

Push Box: Press SPACE while moving and go to the box.

Pull Box: While in pull mode, press X (Press Z for going back to pull mode)

Abandon pull/push mode: Left click

Exit Game: ESCAPE
